TIONS TO MOTHER
Family planning can help to prevent unwanted pregnancies and help to keep the mother 
safe in the future. Checklist users should confirm that family planning options have been 
discussed with and offered to the mother before discharge. Ideally, mothers should be 
given at least two family planning options. Family planning options may include condoms, 
intra-uterine devices, implantable rods, long-acting injectable progesterone (DMPA), oral 
contraceptives, and also tubal ligation
